subject: Re: [junit] catching Throwables (Was:  Should JUnit determine if assert*/fail is called in testFoo?)
msgSnippet: Sounds a little like catch-all-life-insurance to allow you to be lazy in design or implementation? Be careful, you can not catch everything like this, for
messageBody:
Sounds a little like catch-all-life-insurance to allow you to be lazy
in design or implementation?

Be careful, you can not catch everything like this, for examlple a
stack overflow due to infinite recursion just crashed the JVM process
on my machine yesterday.

Robert
